li.label: Potty rebel
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys wearing and using diapers. Having accidents will give them a mood bonus.

li.label: Self concious
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heavily dislikes diapers, reguardless of medical requirement.

li.label: Diaper Lover
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes wearing diapers, regardless of medical requirement.
